Here is a complete listing of all BML used with the BFX and Blizzard Forums.

= ExtendedBML =
Items wrapped in ((double parentheses)) indicate optional parameters. The exBML parser is extremely forgiving, so you are generally safe using the syntax you have already learned for other forums.

  * *Strikethrough*
{{{
[strike](text)[/strike]
[s](text)[/s]
}}}

  * *Blink*
{{{
[blink](text)[/blink]
}}}

  * *Color/Colour*
{{{
[color=(color)](text)[/color]
[colour=(colour)](text)[/colour]
}}}

  * *Hyperlink*
{{{
[url=(URL)]((text))[/url]
[url](URL)[/url]
}}}

  * *Image*
{{{
[img=(URL)]((hover text))[/img]
[img](URL)[/img]
}}}

  * *Horizontal Line Rule*
{{{
[hr]
}}}

  * *BFXVersion*
{{{
[bfxversion=((version number to compare to))]
[bfxversion]
}}}

  * *NoParse*
{{{
[noparse](exBML you do not want to be parsed)[/noparse]
}}}

  * *Donate*
{{{
[donatemaged]
}}}

  * *BML Aliases*
{{{
[bold](text)[/bold]
[italics](text)[/italics]
[underline](text)[/underline]
[pre](text)[/pre]
[listitem](item)[/listitem]
[list](item)[/list]
}}}

----

= BML =
This is the original BML already found in the Blizzard Forums, which the extendedBML is based off of.

  * *Bold*
{{{
[bold](text)[/bold]
[b](text)[/b]
}}}

  * *Italics*
{{{
[i](text)[/i]
}}}

  * *Underline*
{{{
[u](text)[/u]
}}}

  * *Preformatted Text*
{{{
[code](text)[/code]
}}}

  * *Item Link*
{{{
[item="(item id)" /]
}}}

  * *Quote*
{{{
[quote](text)[/quote]
[quote="(post id)"](text)[/quote]
}}}

  * *List Item*
{{{
[li](item)[/li]
}}}

  * *Tabbed List*
{{{
[ul](item)[/ul]
}}}
